name: Dice Of Doom
description:
Dice Of Doom - is a unique spin on the classic roguelike formula. You play as a dice with six deadly sides, each corresponding to one of your abilities. After the end of your turn  the ability on the top of the dice gets activated, so choose your next move carefully.

[Controls]
WASD, arrow keys, or you can click dice faces in the botton-right of the screen

[Instructions]
To win, clear all enemies
You lose if you reach 0 hearts
Choose a direction to get a preview of your next move. Choose the same direction again to confirm
After you complete a stage, you can spend your chips at the shop

[Ability types]
 - attacks 4 tiles right next to the dice
- same as previous, but 2 tiles long on each side
 - attacks 4 tiles diagonally next to the dice
 - same as previous, but 2 tiles long on each side
- restores 1 heart when used
- gives you an additional turn

[Highscores]
The game is endless, so try to get as many points as you can! You are welcome to post your highscore in the comment section
